item.title: Draw Anti-aliased Lines with Geometry Shader
item.description: For engine programmers, there are many cases you have to draw lines on screen, e.g. rendering a grid on the ground, drawing bounding boxes and other helper objects. Usually it's not a problem if you are very used to the jaggies, but recently I can't stand it anymore, my eyes complain to me that they want anti-aliased lines. After a quick search on google, it surprises me that there is no existing handy code piece can meet my needs.
